td.content: s:a male aged 34 yrs complained of decrease in appetite, difficulty walking, urinary hesitation and Body Aches. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 63 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, MRI Spine shows a very large complex disc herniation in the right L4-5 region, patient appears in severe distress a:Low Back Pain p:administered Dexamethasone - 10 MG/ML IV bolus, performed MRI Spine, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
